questionTitle: According to the information on this page, items bought before 1940 ___ more than items made after that year.
Common knowledge to anyone who studies science, the earth ___ on its own axis once every twenty-four hours.
Some of the books on the table ___ to me.
That Shakespeare was one of the most talented writers ___ an understatement to those who are really familiar with the field of literature.
Without the new taxes, houses built before World War II ___ lower costs than more modern homes do.
Swimming in heated pools ___ very common in this part of the country in the winter.
Some of this book ____ not very entertaining.
What ___ the impetus behind tonight's meeting with members of the committee?
According to the police, the killer of the boys in both cities ___ probably between the ages of 40 and 50.
Neither the students nor the teacher ___ about what happens on this trip.
